Hi.... Need advice.. in May month I have  2k in my HSBC EGA Account  and on 1 Jun opted in the bonus interest program  I deposited 200k  to get around 4.6% interest..July month I took out 100k. If I keep the remaining 102k for this month and next month  will I still get 3.6% interest?
This month is August. You can get 3.6% bonus interest for any amounts over the existing 102k  assuming it's 102k throughout Jul.
oh. any idea the ADB is with reference to June or July?
mean there is no interest for the existing 102k  right? So have to move to CIMB Fastsaver or Maribank  any other options?
referring to the incremental ADB (fresh funds). It's comparison is with June or July?
Yes the Page 2 will provide clearer example. But i think should be July too if consistent with past promotions

Hi everyone  for amaze + citi rewards  is the 1000 dollars cap for the 4mpd like for the both of them? I mean can it be 1k using amaze and 1k using citi online spend
Or just up to 1k for the both of them combined.

No idea what you're asking. They are 2 different things. The only thing is you can pair them so amaze converts all spend to online for crmc for 4mpd on eligible MCC.Amaze 1k local limit before fee.Crmc 1k for bonus points.
Yup  so basically  regardless of using amaze or the citi rewards card  I can only earn 4mpd for 1k max per month right?
yes  amaze+crmc is part of the 1k online for crmc
